results.title: Cholesterol synthesis and absorption in coronary patients with lipid triad and isolated high LDL cholesterol in a 4S subgroup.
results.text_hl: @<m>DISEASE_Xeroderma_pigmentosum_variant_type</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C536766 @@@Synthesis@@@ is more effectively reduced by @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ in HTG than ILDL in spite of similar reduction in serum @CHEMICAL_Cholesterol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D002784 @@@cholesterol@@@.
